import React, {useLayoutEffect} from "react" import Back from "../common/back/Back" import "./contact.css" import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next' const Contact = () => { useLayoutEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0)}); const [t] = useTranslation("global"); const map = 'https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m14!1m12!1m3!1d312254.21583801776!2d-96.94288331505958!3d32.85210307015569!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!5e0!3m2!1sen!2sus!4v1689868146400!5m2!1sen!2sus" width="600" height="450" style="border:0;" allowfullscreen="" loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade' return ( <>

{t("header.li6")}

We're open for any suggestion or just to have a chat

Dallas-Fortworth, Texas, USA

EMAIL:

professionalrevise@gmail.com

PHONE:

+ 1235 2355 98

Follow us here

) } export default Contact
